content.title: Breast Lift + Breast Implants - Cosmetic Surgery Thailand - Bangkok, Samui Clinic, Phuket and Pattaya
h2: Breast Lift + Breast Implants in Bangkok

Nights in Hospital: 2Nights in Beyond Suite Hotel (Deluxe Room): 10Duration of operation is about 4-6 hours (breast lift), 2-3 hours (breast implants) and you need to stay in Thailand for at least 12 days.
*We never spam or use high-pressure sales tactics. We promise.
Hospitals | Prices | Doctors | Flights | Hotels | Before & After pictures
paragraphs: Package Includes:✓ Surgery at Internationally Accredited Hospital (Yanhee International Hospital)✓ Operating Theatre, Anaesthesiologist and all associated surgery & Hospital charges✓ All drugs, routine and take home medications✓ Surgery by a renowned Plastic Surgeon, including pre and post-surgery consultations✓ Transfers: Airport / Hotel / Hospital✓ 2 nights (post-surgery) in a Private Hospital Room✓ 10 nights in Beyond Suite Hotel (Deluxe Room : Twin Bed / King Size Bed)✓ Support from BeautyMed customer relations manager
Guarantee:Usually if there is a complication or you are not happy with the results, the hospital will correct the problem free of charge.

Beyond Suite Hotel (Formerly Luxury Suite Hotel) is located on Charansanitwong Road closed to Shopping Area,Yanhee International Hospital, Tesco Lotus, Electricity Generating Authority Of Thailand , International School And University , Business Center.

Short drive to Chatujak Weekend Market, China Town , Khaosan Road, Grand Palace, Wat Phra Kaew (Temple of Emerald Buddha), Phra Men Ground, The International And Domestic Airport are only 30 minutes drive from the hotel.
Wish to upgrade your accommodation?(Current package includes 8 nights in Deluxe Room)
Start typing and press Enter to search

content.body_text: Home Procedures FACE SURGERY Alarplasty Cheek Reduction Chin Augmentation Chin Shaving Forehead Lift Full Face Lift Mini FaceLift Nose Implants Tip Rhinoplasty Nose Surgery Upper Eyelid Surgery Lower Eyelid Surgery BREAST SURGERY Breast Implants Breast Lift Breast Reduction BODY SURGERY Buttock Lift Buttocks Implants Liposuction Lipoplasty Tummy Tuck Vaser Hi Def Vaser Liposelection OTHER SURGERY Male to Female Female to Male Hair Transplants Hospitals Get Surgeon Feedback Breast Lift + Breast Implants in Bangkok Nights in Hospital: 2 Nights in Beyond Suite Hotel (Deluxe Room): 10 Duration of operation is about 4-6 hours (breast lift), 2-3 hours (breast implants) and you need to stay in Thailand for at least 12 days. READ MORE *We never spam or use high-pressure sales tactics. We promise. Package Includes: ✓ Surgery at Internationally Accredited Hospital (Yanhee International Hospital) ✓ Operating Theatre, Anaesthesiologist and all associated surgery & Hospital charges ✓ All drugs, routine and take home medications ✓ Surgery by a renowned Plastic Surgeon, including pre and post-surgery consultations ✓ Transfers: Airport / Hotel / Hospital ✓ 2 nights (post-surgery) in a Private Hospital Room ✓ 10 nights in Beyond Suite Hotel (Deluxe Room : Twin Bed / King Size Bed) ✓ Support from BeautyMed customer relations manager Package Does Not Include: – Flights Guarantee: Usually if there is a complication or you are not happy with the results, the hospital will correct the problem free of charge.
